name: Dark Harvest (Bluntteh)
description:
Shortly after mysteriously dying, a pair of teenagers find themselves in Purgatory with no memory of themselves, or how they got there. Upon arrival, they encounter a being known as The Reaper, who informs them that if they want a second chance at life, they must participate in the Dark Harvest. All they must do is traverse the Five Labyrinths of Purgatory and survive the horrors that dwell within their depths.

Current Version: 1.1 (Only contains Chapter 1)

Dark Harvest will be updated over time with additional chapters until the story is completed!

CHAPTER 2 COMING SOON
